quick_answer.text: A Whopper Jr. contains about 340 calories and 15 g protein.

faqs.q: How many calories are in a Whopper Jr. without mayo?
faqs.a: Removing mayo saves about 90 calories, bringing it to ~250 kcal.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a Whopper Jr.?
faqs.a: Approximately 15 g of protein per Whopper Jr.

faqs.q: How much sodium is in a Whopper Jr.?
faqs.a: Around 580 mg of sodium, which is about 25% of daily recommended intake.

faqs.q: Are there carbs in a Whopper Jr.?
faqs.a: Yes, about 37 g total carbs, including 2 g fiber and 8 g sugars.

faqs.q: How does Whopper Jr. compare to a full Whopper in calories?
faqs.a: A full Whopper has ~670 calories, so the Jr. is roughly half.
